#include<stdio.h>
#define LL long long
int count[100001];
int left[100001];
 
LL bin(int m,int s,int n)
{
        if(left[n]<m)
                return 0;
        int e=n;
        LL ans2=-1;
        while(s<=e)
        {
                int mid=(s+e)/2;
                if(left[mid]>=m)
                {
                        e=mid-1;
                        ans2=mid;
                }
                else
                {
                        s=mid+1;                
                }
        }
        return n-ans2+1;
        
}
int main() 
{
        int counter=0;
        for(int i=2;i<=100000;i++)
        {
                if(!count[i])
                {
                        counter++;
                        for(int j=i+i;j<=100000;j+=i)
                                count[j]++;
                }
                left[i]=counter;
        }
        int t,n,k;
        LL total,prevtotal;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--)
        {
                scanf("%d",&n);
                scanf("%d",&k);
                total=0;
                
                for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
                {
                        if(count[i]==0&&k)
                                total+=bin(left[i]+k-1,i,n);
                        else
                                total+=bin(left[i]+k,i,n);
                        
                                
                }
                printf("%lld\n",total);
        }
}
